spell.name: Stomp
spell.description: When your Dire Beasts charge in, they will stomp the ground, dealing 186,587 Physical damage to all nearby enemies.

spec.name: Beast Mastery
spec.description: A master of the wild who can tame a wide variety of beasts to assist him in combat.

spell.name: Dire Stable
spell.description: Dire Beast generates 12 additional Focus over its duration.

spec.description: A master of the wild who can tame a wide variety of beasts to assist him in combat.

spell.name: Posthaste
spell.description: Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 5 sec.

spell.name: A Murder of Crows
spell.description: Summons a flock of crows to attack your target, dealing 1,306,832 Physical damage over 15 sec. When a target dies while affected by this ability, its cooldown will reset.

spell.name: Binding Shot
spell.description: Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yards for 10 sec, stunning them for 5 sec if they move more than 5 yards from the arrow. Player targets are stunned for a shorter duration.

spell.name: Killer Cobra
spell.description: While Bestial Wrath is active, Cobra Shot resets the cooldown on Kill Command.

spec.name: Beast Mastery
spec.description: A master of the wild who can tame a wide variety of beasts to assist him in combat.

spell.name: Bestial Fury
spell.description: Increase the damage bonus of Bestial Wrath by 15%.

spell.name: Throwing Axes
spell.description: Tosses 3 axes at an enemy, each dealing 75,354 Physical damage.

spec.name: Survival
spec.description: A rugged tracker who favors using animal venom, explosives and traps as deadly weapons.

spell.name: Snake Hunter
spell.description: Instantly grants you 3 charges of Mongoose Bite.

spell.name: Guerrilla Tactics
spell.description:
Explosive Trap deals 50% more damage, and Waylay's effects are further strengthened:



Freezing Trap will not break due to damage for the first 6 sec.

Tar Trap reduces enemies' movement speed by 90% for the first 4 sec.

spec.name: Survival
spec.description: A rugged tracker who favors using animal venom, explosives and traps as deadly weapons.

spell.name: Ranger's Net
spell.description: Hurls a net at the enemy, rooting the target for 3 sec and reducing movement speed by 50% for 15 sec. Damage may break the effect.

spec.name: Survival
spec.description: A rugged tracker who favors using animal venom, explosives and traps as deadly weapons.

spell.name: Dragonsfire Grenade
spell.description: Hurls a dragonsfire grenade at the target that explodes into flames, inflicting 308,652 Fire damage over 8 sec and reducing movement speed by 20%. The volatile flames on the target also scorch nearby enemies.

spec.name: Survival
spec.description: A rugged tracker who favors using animal venom, explosives and traps as deadly weapons.

spell.name: Expert Trapper
spell.description:
All of your traps are improved in the following ways:



Freezing Trap

When Freezing Trap's incapacitate effect ends, the victim and all nearby enemies' movement speed is reduced by 50% for 4 sec.



Explosive Trap

Increases Explosive Trap's damage to the triggering enemy by 75%.



Tar Trap

Enemies moving through the tar have a chance to be rooted in place for 4 sec.



Steel Trap

Your Steel Trap also deals an immediate 120,566 Bleed damage when triggered.



Caltrops

Increases Caltrops damage by 50%.

spell.name: Wyvern Sting
spell.description: A stinging shot that puts the target to sleep, incapacitating them for 30 sec. Damage will cancel the effect. Usable while moving.

spell.name: Posthaste
spell.description: Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 5 sec.

spell.name: Careful Aim
spell.description: Aimed Shot, Arcane Shot, Marked Shot, and Multi-Shot have 20% increased critical strike chance against targets above 80% Health, and those critical strikes deal an additional 30% damage over 8 sec.

spec.name: Marksmanship
spec.description: A master archer or sharpshooter who excels in bringing down enemies from afar.

spell.name: Lock and Load
spell.description: Your ranged auto attacks have a 8% chance to trigger Lock and Load, causing your next two Aimed Shots to cost no Focus and be instant.

spell.name: Patient Sniper
spell.description: Gain the patience of a veteran sniper, increasing the damage bonus of Vulnerable by 10% every 1 sec.

spec.name: Marksmanship

spell.name: Trick Shot
spell.description:
Aimed Shot will now also ricochet and hit all Vulnerable targets for 30% of normal damage.



If there are no other Vulnerable targets, the damage of your next Aimed Shot is increased by 15%.
